external_references.description: Koessel, Sean. Adair, Steven. Lancaster, Tom. (2024, November 22). The Nearest Neighbor Attack: How A Russian APT Weaponized Nearby Wi-Fi Networks for Covert Access. Retrieved February 25, 2025.

objects.description: During [APT28 Nearest Neighbor Campaign](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0051), [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) established wireless connections to secure, enterprise Wi-Fi networks belonging to a target organization for initial access into the environment.(Citation: Nearest Neighbor Volexity)
